org.apache.fop.afp.ptoca

Interface PtocaConstants

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LineDataInfoProducer, PresentationTextData, PtocaBuilder, TextDataInfoProducer

    public interface PtocaConstants
    A collection of PTOCA constants.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte AMB
      Absolute Move Baseline

      Set Coded Font Local

      Set Extended Text Color

      Set Intercharacter Adjustment
      static byte STO
      Set Text Orientation
      static byte SVI
      Set Variable Space Character Increment
      static int TRANSPARENT_DATA_MAX_SIZE
      Maximum size of transparent data chunks
      static byte TRN
      Transparent Data
